translations: 违背（承诺、保证等）（renege on）；（牌戏中）有牌不跟（renege 的现在分词形式）
<古>放弃，拒绝（renege 的现在分词形式）

sentences.sentence: Both sides kept accusing each other of reneging on it.
sentences.translation: 两边都不断指责对方违反了协议。

sentences.sentence: Reneging on our commitments to the world's poor cannot be an austerity measure, " she said.
sentences.translation: 放弃我们给世界上的穷国的承诺不能成为一种紧缩措施。
